stories.text:
The purpose of this post is to start talking about high-level AI/ML concepts in an ELI5 manner, such that we do NOT branch off into esoteric which no child can begin to grasp without decades off loss-leader human bullshit)

OUT OF THE GATE: Regardless of whatever your research, especially AI/ML is - The opening statement should be an ELI5 of what you state.

AND MAKE THOSE SEARCHABLE:

"How to make a BLAH do a BLAH"

and tree into knowledge of.

--

I know this sounds weird, but think GENERATIONS ahead of where you are now.

LEARN to TEACH design models that, in and of themselves LEARN TO TEACH, others

[ https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31573282 ]

As an example ; Hear me out...

This is a thread talking about how we may start interpreting (humans) how to properly understand AI linguistic evolution etc...

This is going to hockeystick before we even see it coming.

THUS

May we please have a standard for ELI5 format. (instead of an TL;DR trope)

AN ACTUAL STANDARD.

Why Am I asking this?

Imagine the velocity of thought, science, ingenuity and discovery that is constantly evolving.

We are, as a techno-sapiens as grimes put it (apropros cyberpunk dystopian weird shit her name implies (that 'grimes' talks about techno-sapiens) ((Transhumanists are trying too hard to become the emodiment of the mechanical elves)) [God I hope you get those layers, as I am to focused to type them out)

--

So lets bring this back down to the ELI5 request.

You are a researcher in AI/ML/Whatever it will be called (HUMAN ACTIVITY AUGMENTED IN SOME MANNER BY THE TECH THAT IS CREATED BY HUMAN MINDS< BUT ULTIMATELY RELIES ON THE TECHNOLOGY WHICH ENABLED IT)

And the iterations beyond.

SO lets imagine a human zygote.

The development of that mind, in say, a womb circa -1400 comes ...

* We learned how to not let our offspring die.

* We learned that in order for them to survive, they needed to build the same infra to support their offspring (meaning not die themselves, see #1)

* We learned that as we grow, #1 can involve others outside of FAMILY

etc... You know the thing, Man, C'mon man. (joe biden demntial anomally detected)

---

We need to treat AI COMPLETELY DIFFERENTLY and more conscientious than ever.

--

But the current implementations are absurd and fucking evil.
stories.title: Idea HN: Make AI/ML etc. easier to start to learn with an ELI5 Requirement
